Uses of Class
imagingbook.pub.corners.subpixel.SubpixelMaxInterpolator

  • Packages that use SubpixelMaxInterpolator 
    Package Description
    imagingbook.pub.corners.subpixel  

    • Uses of SubpixelMaxInterpolator in imagingbook.pub.corners.subpixel

      Subclasses of SubpixelMaxInterpolator in imagingbook.pub.corners.subpixel 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  SubpixelMaxInterpolator.QuadraticLeastSquares
      2D interpolator based on least-squares fitting a quadratic polynomial
      static class  SubpixelMaxInterpolator.QuadraticTaylor
      2D interpolator using second-order Taylor expansion to find the coefficients of the quadratic interpolating polynomial
      static class  SubpixelMaxInterpolator.Quartic
      2D interpolator based on fitting a 'quartic' (i.e., 4th-order) polynomial
      f(x,y) = c_0 + c_1 x + c_2 y + c_3 x^2 + c_4 y^2 + c_5 x y + c_6 x^2 y + c_7 x y^2 + c_8 x^2 y^2
      to the supplied sample values.
      Methods in imagingbook.pub.corners.subpixel that return SubpixelMaxInterpolator 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static SubpixelMaxInterpolator SubpixelMaxInterpolator.getInstance​(SubpixelMaxInterpolator.Method m)
      Creates a specific SubpixelMaxInterpolator instance based on the supplied SubpixelMaxInterpolator.Method key.
